title: Discovery Parks - Barossa Valley

reasoning: The package is a 3-night accommodation-only offer at Discovery Parks - Barossa Valley for 786 total (393pp). Flights are explicitly not included per the deal page. Given the low per-person price for 3 nights in the Barossa region, the deal appears reasonably priced as a budget accommodation offer, but verification against live hotel rates and any included 'bonuses' is required to confirm true value.
additional_notes: If you want a full comparison I can fetch live rates from booking.com, Expedia or supplier sites to compute DIY totals and precise savings vs this package.
